meanings: (상태·품질 등이) good, fine, nice, (다른 것보다) better (than), superior (to)

vlive.korean: 좋군~ a nice day~ 듣기 View video MONSTA X : LIVE : Verlin in I.M
눈썰미가 좋군! You have good eyes! 듣기 View video Hahm Eun Jung : 은정이 베트남에 또 왔지롱~ Eun Jung lại đến Việt Nam rồi đây ~~
우와 좋군. Wow, so nice. 듣기 View video SF9 : ☺☺
좋군! 오랜만에 기억났어. Nice. I remembered it in a long time. 듣기 View video MONSTA X : [몬채널][B] EP.88 'JEALOUSY' MV
vlive.english: Nice. I remembered it in a long time.

vlive.korean: 또 막상 이렇게 임무를 잘 끝내고 나니 기분이 아주아주 좋군요. and considering how we finished the mission, I feel very very great. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [FULL] CLC X SUITS KNIGHTS - CLC의 정장방!
vlive.english: and considering how we finished the mission, I feel very very great.

examples.korean: What blooming awful weather! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 정말 날씨 짜증나게 안 좋군! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: I prefer this colour, for what it’s worth. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 난 이 색깔이 더 좋군요. 그냥 내 생각일 뿐이지만. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I prefer this colour, for what it’s worth. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Who put you onto this restaurant—it’s great! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 누가 당신한테 이 식당을 알려 준 거예요. 아주 좋군요! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Who put you onto this restaurant—it’s great! Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: This dress is really nice. Pity it’s so expensive. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 드레스는 정말 좋군요. 값이 너무 비싸서 유감이에요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This dress is really nice. Pity it’s so expensive. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It’s nice to see some new faces here this evening. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 오늘 밤 이곳에서 새로운 얼굴들을 좀 볼 수 있어서 좋군요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It’s nice to see some new faces here this evening. Add to Wordbook
